attributes.action: Government to implement new laws on knife crime
attributes.background: In the space of just 4 days 4 people have been stabbed to death on the streets of London. Knife crime is a increasingly common thing we are seeing in the UK. The government needs to take action on this and introduce new laws and more policing to keep our streets safe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what new laws you'd like the Government or Parliament to put in place. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
